resources.string: Thanks for installing WebKiosk.\nIt\'s necessary to setup the app in 2 simple steps.\nPress Next to continue.
Enter the web page or the URL that you want to display.\nOnce done, press Next.

Now, it\'s necessary to setup an unlock sequence to make future changes. n\Define it by pressing 4 corners on the display of your device in the sequence that you want, like the red arrows of the picture.\nIt will be necessary to confirm the introduced sequence.

WebKiosk is already set correctly.\nNow, to make changes, remember unlocking the app pressing the corners of the display like the previously set sequence.\nTo execute the app using all the screen, we recommend install Full!Screen. (Necessary ROOT)
Press the corners of the display by 4 times in the desired order
It\'s necessary to setup the sequence before continue
